items.content_html:
I don’t know much about tech or media, but if a tech oligarch was helping to systematically dismantle the federal government using his own sequestered private sector employees, I might not, personally, report on it by primarily posting to the social media platform that he himself owns.

— Ben Werdmuller
items.content_text:
> I don't know much about tech or media, but if a tech oligarch was helping to systematically dismantle the federal government using his own sequestered private sector employees, I might not, personally, report on it by primarily posting to the social media platform that he himself owns.

— [Ben Werdmuller](https://werd.social/@/ben/113906239663624996)

items.content_html: 80 years ago we decided Nazis were people we needed to actively oppose.
items.content_text: 80 years ago we decided [Nazis](https://swoods.net/uploads/2025/elon-musk-nazi.mp4) were people we needed to _actively oppose_.

items.content_html:
I’m gonna hop off Micro.blog for a bit. Need to put my thoughts and feelings together away from the space that is inciting them, mostly in a bad way.

I’m going to post a thank-you note for many who have spoken up, and then I’ll be gone for a few days.

If anyone wants to chat, I am available.
items.content_text:
I'm gonna hop off Micro.blog for a bit. Need to put my thoughts and feelings together _away_ from the space that is inciting them, mostly in a bad way.

I'm going to post a thank-you note for many who have spoken up, and then I'll be gone for a few days.

If anyone wants to chat, [I am available](https://swoods.net/hello/).

items.content_html:
I felt so good about my work for TIL, and therefore Micro.blog itself (my work is unofficial and, other than being supplied with complimentary hosting I am unpaid) – and now I just don’t know.

Unconvinced that spark of community can be recovered. It feels as if the only shoe has dropped.
items.content_text:

items.content_html:
We’re playing some games tonight! Our usual D&D session is on hold since we don’t have a full table until next week.

I’m gonna go prep for that, and get back to work on emails and posts about Micro.blog either tonight or in the morning.
